paragraphs.content: Chapter 5
paragraphs.contentHtml: Chapter 5

paragraphs.content: Remember, O LORD, what is come upon us: consider, and behold our reproach.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Remember, O Lord, what is come upon us: consider, and behold our reproach.

paragraphs.content: Our inheritance is turned to strangers, our houses to aliens.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Our inheritance is turned to strangers, our houses to aliens.

paragraphs.content: We are orphans and fatherless, our mothers are as widows.
paragraphs.contentHtml: We are orphans and fatherless, our mothers are as widows.

paragraphs.content: We have drunken our water for money; our wood is sold unto us.
paragraphs.contentHtml: We have drunken our water for money; our wood is sold unto us.

paragraphs.content: Our necks are under persecution: we labour, and have no rest.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Our necks are under persecution: we labour, and have no rest.

paragraphs.content: We have given the hand to the Egyptians, and to the Assyrians, to be satisfied with bread.
paragraphs.contentHtml: We have given the hand to the Egyptians, and to the Assyrians, to be satisfied with bread.

paragraphs.content: Our fathers have sinned, and are not; and we have borne their iniquities.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Our fathers have sinned, and are not; and we have borne their iniquities.

paragraphs.content: Servants have ruled over us: there is none that doth deliver us out of their hand.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Servants have ruled over us: there is none that doth deliver us out of their hand.

paragraphs.content: We gat our bread with the peril of our lives because of the sword of the wilderness.
paragraphs.contentHtml: We gat our bread with the peril of our lives because of the sword of the wilderness.

paragraphs.content: Our skin was black like an oven because of the terrible famine.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Our skin was black like an oven because of the terrible famine.

paragraphs.content: They ravished the women in Zion, and the maids in the cities of Judah.
paragraphs.contentHtml: They ravished the women in Zion, and the maids in the cities of Judah.

paragraphs.content: Princes are hanged up by their hand: the faces of elders were not honoured.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Princes are hanged up by their hand: the faces of elders were not honoured.

paragraphs.content: They took the young men to grind, and the children fell under the wood.
paragraphs.contentHtml: They took the young men to grind, and the children fell under the wood.

paragraphs.content: The elders have ceased from the gate, the young men from their musick.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The elders have ceased from the gate, the young men from their musick.

paragraphs.content: The joy of our heart is ceased; our dance is turned into mourning.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The joy of our heart is ceased; our dance is turned into mourning.

paragraphs.content: The crown is fallen from our head: woe unto us, that we have sinned!
paragraphs.contentHtml: The crown is fallen from our head: woe unto us, that we have sinned!

paragraphs.content: For this our heart is faint; for these things our eyes are dim.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For this our heart is faint; for these things our eyes are dim.

paragraphs.content: Because of the mountain of Zion, which is desolate, the foxes walk upon it.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Because of the mountain of Zion, which is desolate, the foxes walk upon it.

paragraphs.content: Thou, O LORD, remainest for ever; thy throne from generation to generation.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Thou, O Lord, remainest for ever; thy throne from generation to generation.

paragraphs.content: Wherefore dost thou forget us for ever, and forsake us so long time?
paragraphs.contentHtml: Wherefore dost thou forget us for ever, and forsake us so long time?

paragraphs.content: Turn thou us unto thee, O LORD, and we shall be turned; renew our days as of old.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Turn thou us unto thee, O Lord, and we shall be turned; renew our days as of old.

paragraphs.content: But thou hast utterly rejected us; thou art very wroth against us.
paragraphs.contentHtml: But thou hast utterly rejected us; thou art very wroth against us.
